name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8CH H.264 1 TB Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Cameras and Smart Phone Compatibility (21133)

reviews.name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8-Channel Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Ultra Hi-Res Surveillance Cameras
reviews.reviewText: The system is a very good system for the money. Had no problem installing it. Wish I would have got one sooner. Knowing what's going on while I'm not at home I like that.
reviews.title: A very good system for the money

reviews.name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8-Channel Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Ultra Hi-Res Surveillance Cameras
reviews.reviewText: love it very easy to install. the picture quallity is great. night vision works perfect down loaded the app to what on iphone was simple. everything was pretty much plug and play. looked at a lot of camera's before i purchased this one. by far better than any of the others for the money. as far as picture quality ease of instillation would defiantly recommend.
reviews.title: great product

reviews.name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8-Channel Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Ultra Hi-Res Surveillance Cameras
reviews.reviewText: I received the system and installed it. There where 2 cameras that didn't have picture. I called and they said I would have to mail them to New York and if they agreed with me they would send me replacements. This is fine except it may be 6 weeks from the time I ordered and payed for the best shipping option on the system before it works. I would strongly recommend dealing with someone local that can deal with defective product more effectively.
reviews.title: would have been ok if it all worked

reviews.name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8-Channel Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Ultra Hi-Res Surveillance Cameras
reviews.title: cameras

reviews.name: Defender PRO Sentinel 8-Channel Smart Security DVR with 4 PRO/4 Dome Ultra Hi-Res Surveillance Cameras
reviews.reviewText: Considering the intracay of the unit it was relativly easy to install.  The picture quality is quality is superb.  I have no complaints.  A credit to Defender Engineers
reviews.title: Install & Operation
